title: Cant get the gemstone from the augment bundle after i waited a day
body: So I purchased the Augment + Bundle on August 2 and got my gemstone that came with it and an extra one from opening one of the boxes but today August 3rd i purchased another and didn't get my gemstone. IS there something going on with it or did i just get my 2nd gemstone in advance?

replies.body:
It sounds strange that you wouldn't get a gemstone after waiting the required amount of time, so I took a look into your specific issue.  I discovered that you received a gemstone with both bundle purchases, setting your total to 4.  Nothing looks out of order here!  

If you would like some additional information such as time or other specifics, our billing team can help you out.  We prefer not to share sensitive account details on the boards, so reach out to us in a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Otherwise, I hope that helps!
thanks it did help so when you purchase the bundle does that mean the gemstone is automatically given to you and there is no need to open a augment box for it to show up?

I didn't have any gems, and when I bought a bundle there was a gem in my inventory.  So they are just given to you, they don't come inside anything.


EDIT: And does anybody know why I am level 18 but still can't post in General?  If not oh well, guess I will keep waiting.  :)

The gemstones will appear in your inventory!
